definition: sandy beach or river bank/sand dune/sandy land
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
see 啟海話|启海话[Qi3 hai3 hua4]

sentences.english: This paper studies on the relationship between the Ma Wusu sands control and particle board′s building.
sentences.chinese: 本文論述了毛烏素沙地治理與刨花板廠建設的關係。

sentences.english: So they winked and they blinked in the sand in the sun.
sentences.chinese: 於是，它們在陽光下的沙地上眨着眼睛。

sentences.english: They sang upon the sand their song of faith, while with their staff of promise they dug the well.
sentences.chinese: 他們在沙地上唱信心的歌，同時用應許的杖掘井。

sentences.english: Serai process of vegetation on the sand of Zhanggutai in Liaoning province is from moving dune.
sentences.chinese: 遼寧省章古臺沙地植被的演替過程，從流動沙丘開始。

sentences.english: The northern part of Liaoning Province lies to the south of Kerqin Desert of Inner Mongolia.
sentences.chinese: 遼寧北部處於內蒙古科爾沁沙地“百里翰海”的南緣。

sentences.english: Ecosystem made of Picea mongolica is a special sandy forest ecosystem in China.
sentences.chinese: 沙地雲杉林是陸地上非常特殊的森林生態系統類型。

sentences.english: Up another incline and he parked the Peugeot in a sandy lot.
sentences.chinese: 再往上另一個斜坡，他把這皮哥特車停在一塊沙地上。

sentences.english: Ulmus pumila open forest ecosystem plays an important role in Otindag Sandy Land.
sentences.chinese: 榆樹疏林生態系統是渾善達克沙地的重要組分之一。

sentences.english: When the sound is softer, the rover was moving on sand.
sentences.chinese: 而探測器在沙地上移動時，聲音就會較小。

sentences.english: It comes in a desert colour scheme of tans and browns.
sentences.chinese: 這款鞋採用沙地配色方案，呈黃褐色和棕色。

sentences.english: This paper deals with the water regimes of Sabina vulgaris community in China"s Maowusu Sandland."
sentences.chinese: 對毛烏素沙地沙地柏羣落的水分狀況作了初步研究。

sentences.english: This paper deals with the water regimes of Sabina vulgaris community in China"s Maowusu Sandland."
sentences.chinese: 對毛烏素沙地沙地柏羣落的水分狀況作了初步研究。

sentences.english: The Hunshandake sand land located in the warm temperate zone which is continental monsoon climate area.
sentences.chinese: 渾善達克沙地屬中溫帶半乾旱大陸性季風氣候區。

sentences.english: Those results serve as a guide to the protection of ecological environment of the sandland.
sentences.chinese: 成果對沙地生態保護具有一定的指導作用。

sentences.english: One afternoon, 25mm. of rain fell over the Changsha area.
sentences.chinese: 一天下午，長沙地區下了25毫米的雨。

sentences.english: Roots water sharing of sandy shrub Prunus pedunculata Maxim.
sentences.chinese: 研究了沙地灌木柄扁桃根系的水分共享狀況。
